event.title: will be replaced in four months

data.event: Broken road sign will be replaced in four months.
A road sign in East Oxford which was damaged a year ago is set to be replaced.

event.title: had been removed in March last year

data.event: People living in Divinity Road, first noticed the letters to their street sign had been removed in March last year.

event.title: will be put up in a couple of weeks

data.event: A temporary sign will be put up in a couple of weeks.
